job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
The National Security Agency in Texas is hiring for the following positions (and many more at https://apply.intelligencecareers.gov/job-listings?agency=NSA):


Software Engineer @ https://apply.intelligencecareers.gov/job-description/1168299


Software Engineer @ https://apply.intelligencecareers.gov/job-description/1166240


Software Engineer @ https://apply.intelligencecareers.gov/job-description/1164116


Network Manager @ https://apply.intelligencecareers.gov/job-description/1166238


Cyber Network Professional (Offensive/Defensive) @ https://apply.intelligencecareers.gov/job-description/1166578


Contact me if you determine NSA in Texas may be a great fit for your professional career especially if you already possess a CI/FS - P. If you've already applied for a position with us, please let me know so I can connect some of the dots for you from a recruiter and hiring manager perspective. Cheers! -Greg
